description: This file defines API endpoints using FastAPI for starting and stopping music streaming sessions. It manages streaming sessions, handles track identification, and generates mock stream URLs.

classes.name: StreamSession
classes.description: Represents a music streaming session in the database.

classes.name: Track
classes.description: Represents a music track in the database.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user in the database.

methods.name: start_stream(payload: StreamStartRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles the POST request to start a music streaming session, resolving track info and creating a session record.

methods.name: stop_stream(payload: StreamStopRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles the POST request to stop a streaming session, marking it as ended.

ctags.name: start_stream
ctags.pattern: /^def start_stream(payload: StreamStartRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = /
ctags.signature: (payload: StreamStartRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: stop_stream
ctags.pattern: /^def stop_stream(payload: StreamStopRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = De/
ctags.signature: (payload: StreamStopRequest, user: User = Depends(current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
